com.couchbase.kafka

Interface CouchbaseEnvironment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.couchbase.client.core.env.CoreEnvironment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCouchbaseEnvironment

    public interface CouchbaseEnvironment
extends com.couchbase.client.core.env.CoreEnvironment
    A CouchbaseEnvironment settings related to Kafka connection, in addition to all the core building blocks like environment settings and thread pools inherited from CoreEnvironment so that the application can work with it properly.

    This interface defines the contract. How properties are loaded is chosen by the implementation. See the DefaultCouchbaseEnvironment class for the default implementation.

    Note that the CouchbaseEnvironment is stateful, so be sure to call CoreEnvironment.shutdown() properly.
    Author:
    Sergey Avseyev
